1{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
2{-# LANGUAGE OverloadedStrings #-}
3{-# LANGUAGE TupleSections #-}
4{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
5
6-- | Decode contents from token trees.
7
8module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Decode.Content
9  ( -- * Functions
10    DecodeContent,
11    CalcContent, 
12    stringContent,
13    treeContent,
14    treesJudge,
15  ) where
16
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                as O
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                    as B
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax                  as S
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type                    as T
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class              as D
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Decode.Numeric     as D
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Decode.Term        as D
24import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Decode.Type        as D
25import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Pattern          as P
26import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Message            as Msg
27import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Decode.Message     as Msg
28
29
30-- ----------------------  General content
31
32-- | Content decoder.
33type DecodeContent t c = S.TTree t -> B.Ab c
34
35-- | Content calculator.
36type CalcContent t c = S.TTree t -> B.Ab c
37
38-- | Decode content from string.
39stringContent :: (D.CContent c) => String -> B.Ab c
40stringContent = treeContent O.#. (S.toTree :: String -> B.Ab S.Tree)
41
42-- | Decode content from token tree.
43treeContent :: forall t c. (S.TextualTermName t, D.CContent c) => DecodeContent t c
44treeContent tree = Msg.abLiteral tree $ cons tree where
45    cons :: DecodeContent t c
46    cons x@(P.L tok)
47        = (putDecimal O.# D.treesDigits [x]) O.<||>
48          (D.putTime  O.# D.treesTime [x])   O.<||>
49          (D.putClock O.# D.tokenClock tok)  O.<||>
50          (tokenContent tok)
51    cons (P.B b xs) = case b of
52        S.BracketGroup   -> group xs
53        S.BracketList    -> D.putList   O.# treesContents cons xs
54        S.BracketSet     -> D.putSet    O.# treesContents cons xs
55        S.BracketTie     ->                 treesTie      cons xs
56        S.BracketRel     -> D.putRel    O.# treesRel      cons xs
57        S.BracketType    -> D.putType   O.# D.treesType        xs
58        S.BracketInterp  -> D.putInterp O.# D.treesInterp      xs
59        _                -> Msg.unkBracket
60    cons _ = B.bug "treeContent"
61
62    group :: [S.TTree t] -> B.Ab c
63    group xs@(P.LRaw _ : _)  = (putDecimal O.# D.treesDigits xs) O.<||>
64                               (D.putTime  O.# D.treesTime xs)
65    group []                 = Right D.empty
66    group _                  = Msg.unkContent
67
68    putDecimal = D.putDec O.#. T.decodeDecimal
69
70tokenContent :: (S.TextualTermName t, D.CContent c) => S.TToken t -> B.Ab c
71tokenContent (P.T f w)
72    | f <= S.TextRaw     = keyword w
73    | f == S.TextQ       = D.putCode w
74    | f == S.TextTerm    = D.putTerm $ S.toTermName w
75    | otherwise          = D.putText w
76    where
77      keyword "(+)"  = Right D.true
78      keyword "(-)"  = Right D.false
79      keyword "(/)"  = Right D.end
80      keyword "dum"  = Right D.dum
81      keyword "dee"  = Right D.dee
82      keyword "0"    = Right D.false  -- obsolete
83      keyword "1"    = Right D.true   -- obsolete
84      keyword _      = Msg.unkContent
85tokenContent _ = Msg.unkContent
86
87-- List of contents
88--
89--   { 0 | 1 | 2 }
90--   [ 0 | 1 | 2 ]
91--     .........
92--     :
93--     treesContents
94--
95treesContents :: (O.Textual t, D.CContent c) => DecodeContent t c -> [S.TTree t] -> B.Ab [c]
96treesContents _   [] = Right []
97treesContents cons cs = lt `mapM` S.divideTreesByBar cs where
98    lt []   = Right D.empty
99    lt [x]  = cons x
100    lt xs   = cons $ B.TreeB S.BracketGroup Nothing xs
101
102-- Contents enclosed in angle brackets
103--
104--   {- /a 1  /b 2  /c 3 -}   << words "a b c" >>
105--      ................         .............
106--      :                        :
107--      treesTie                 treesTie
108--
109treesTie :: (S.TextualTermName t, D.CContent c) => DecodeContent t c -> [S.TTree t] -> B.Ab c
110treesTie cons xs@(P.LTerm _ : _) = D.putTie O.# treesTerms cons xs
111treesTie _ [] = D.putTie []
112treesTie _ [P.LRaw "words", P.LQq ws] = D.putList (D.pText <$> O.tWords ws)
113treesTie _ _ = Msg.adlib "unknown tie"
114
115-- Terms
116--
117--   /a 1  /b 2  /c 3
118--   ................
119--   :
120--   treesTerms
121--
122treesTerms :: (S.ToTermName t, D.CContent c) => DecodeContent t c -> [S.TTree t] -> B.Ab [S.Term c]
123treesTerms cons = mapM p O.#. D.treesTerms1 where
124    p (name, tree) = Right . (name,) O.# cons tree
125
126-- | Decode judge from token trees.
127--   Judges itself are not content type.
128--   It can be only used in the top-level of resources.
129treesJudge ::
130    (S.TextualTermName t, D.CContent c)
131    => D.CacheT t        -- ^ Term name cache
132    -> T.AssertType       -- ^ Assertion type
133    -> S.JudgeClass       -- ^ Judgement class
134    -> [S.TTree t]        -- ^ Trees of terms
135    -> B.Ab (D.CacheT t, T.Judge c)   -- ^ Error or decoded judgement
136treesJudge cc q cl trees =
137    do (cc', ts) <- D.treesTermsCached cc trees
138       terms <- mapM term ts
139       Right (cc', T.assertAs q cl terms)
140    where
141      term (n, ts) = do c <- treeContent $ S.ttreeGroup ts
142                        Right (n, c)
143
144
145-- ----------------------  Relation
146--
147--        .............  treesRel  .............
148--        :                                    :
149--     {= /a /b /c  [ 0 | 1 | 2 ]  [ 3 | 4 | 5 ] =}
150--        ........  .............  .............
151--        :         :              :
152--        :         treeTuple      treeTuple
153--        treesTermNames
154--
155--
156treesRel :: (S.TextualTermName t, D.CContent c) => DecodeContent t c -> [S.TTree t] -> B.Ab (T.Rel c)
157treesRel cons xs =
158    do bo <- treeTuple cons n `mapM` xs'
159       Right $ T.Rel he $ B.unique bo
160    where
161      (ns, xs')  = treesTermNames xs
162      n          = length ns
163      he         = T.headFrom ns
164
165-- | Split term names.
166treesTermNames :: (S.ToTermName t) => [S.TTree t] -> ([S.TermName], [S.TTree t])
167treesTermNames = terms [] where
168    terms ns (P.LTerm n : xs) = terms (S.toTermName n : ns) xs
169    terms ns xs = (reverse ns, xs)
170
171-- | Decode specific number of contents.
172treeTuple :: (O.Textual t, D.CContent c) => DecodeContent t c -> Int -> S.TTree t -> B.Ab [c]
173treeTuple cons n g@(P.B S.BracketList xs) =
174    do cs <- treesContents cons xs
175       let n' = length cs
176       B.when (n /= n') $ Msg.abLiteral g $ Msg.oddRelation n n'
177       Right cs
178treeTuple _ _ g = Msg.abLiteral g $ Msg.reqRelTuple
179
